content.raw:
they are currently optional for ign-rendering mainly because many of the features that depend on these components are not implemented yet but later on all will be made required.

ign-rendering's ign-cmake branch is currently using the Component's pull request to build `ign-rendering0-ogre` and `ign-rendering0-optix` components. It's still WIP but almost there.
content.html:
they are currently optional for ign-rendering mainly because many of the features that depend on these components are not implemented yet but later on all will be made required.

ign-rendering's ign-cmake branch is currently using the Component's pull request to build ign-rendering0-ogre and ign-rendering0-optix components. It's still WIP but almost there.
